    • Method Detail

      • locationClicked

        public boolean locationClicked(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
        returns true to override the Gridworld locationClicked
        Overrides:
        locationClicked in class info.gridworld.world.World<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>
        Parameters:
        loc - the grid location that the user selected
        Returns:
        true if the world consumes the click, or false if the GUI should invoke the Location->Edit menu action

      • keyPressed

        public boolean keyPressed(java.lang.String description,
                          info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
        Overrides the Gridworld keyPressed method. It moves the player and does other functions based on the key pressed
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class info.gridworld.world.World<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>
        Parameters:
        description - the string describing the key, in this format.
        loc - the selected location in the grid at the time the key was pressed
        Returns:
        true if the world consumes the key press, false if the GUI should consume it.

      • grassWorld

        public void grassWorld()
        creates all of the grass and tree border when you first load the world

      • save

        public static void save()
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        saves the game. Saves the player's name and Pokemon caught
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if no output text

      • load

        public void load()
        loads in a saved file. Loads the player's name and Pokemon caught
